## sendAdaptiveCard() function

Send an adaptive card message to a notification target.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sendAdaptiveCard(target: NotificationTarget, card: unknown): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | [NotificationTarget](./teamsfx.notificationtarget.md) | the notification target. |
|  card | unknown | the adaptive card raw JSON. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A `Promise` representing the asynchronous operation.
